#summary Method baseMaterialsForTypeID details

= /baseMaterialsForTypeID/(typeID) =

List of base materials for given item typeID.

== Attributes ==

|| materialTypeID || Number ||
|| materialTypeName || String ||
|| materialTypeCategoryID || Number ||
|| quantity || Number ||
|| materialTypeGraphicIcon || String ||

== Examples ==

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/baseMaterialsForTypeID/1234567890 baseMaterialsForTypeID/1234567890] (HTTP 400)
